blocks.name: cipo
blocks.content: Class function defining inclusion posets.
blocks.origin: const class cipo { toInc }

blocks.name: diff.cipo.s
diff.cipo.c
diff.cipo.w
df-ipo
blocks.content: For any family of sets, define the poset of that family ordered by inclusion. See ~ ipobas , ~ ipolerval , and ~ ipole for its contract. _EDITORIAL_: I'm not thrilled with the name. Any suggestions? (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ipo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cipo, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s3, copab(s1, s2, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s0)), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, cv(s3)))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cv(s3)), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s1, cv(s0), cuni(crab(s2, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ipo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ toInc =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[{ < s1, s2 > |({ s1, s2 } ‚äÜ s0 ‚àß s1 ‚äÜ s2)} / s3]({ <(Base ` ndx), s0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` s3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), s3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s2 ‚àà s0 |(s2 ‚ãÇ s1)= ‚àÖ })> }))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: ipostr
blocks.content: The structure of ~ df-ipo is a structure defining indices up to 11. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ipostr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wbr(cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c1)), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), c3))), cstr, cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat1)))
} = {
  strleun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c1)), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), c3)), nat1, cdc(nat1, nat1), nat9, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  strle2(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0, cfv(cts, cnx), c1, nat1, nat9)
  basendx()
  1lt9()
  9nn()
  tsetndx()
  strle2(cfv(cple, cnx), c2, cfv(coc, cnx), c3, cdc(nat1, nat0), cdc(nat1, nat1))
  10nn()
  plendx()
  declt(nat1, nat0, nat1)
  0nn0()
  0lt1()
  decnncl(nat1, nat1)
  1nn0()
  1nn()
  ocndx()
  9lt10()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ipostr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx), c1 > } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c2 >, <(oc ` ndx), c3 > })[Struct]< 1, cdc(1, 1)>
} = {
  strleun({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx), c1 > }, { <(le ` ndx), c2 >, <(oc ` ndx), c3 > }, nat1, cdc(1, 1), nat9, cdc(1, 0))
  strle2((Base ` ndx), c0, (TopSet ` ndx), c1, nat1, nat9)
  basendx()
  1lt9()
  9nn()
  tsetndx()
  strle2((le ` ndx), c2, (oc ` ndx), c3, cdc(1, 0), cdc(1, 1))
  10nn()
  plendx()
  declt(nat1, nat0, nat1)
  0nn0()
  0lt1()
  decnncl(nat1, nat1)
  1nn0()
  1nn()
  ocndx()
  9lt10()
}

thm ipoval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cipo, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))), cfv(cipo, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cipo, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))), csb(hs1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0)), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, cv(hs1)))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))))))))
  csbied2(hs1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0)), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, cv(hs1)))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))), cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))), universe, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), universe))
  ssexi(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  xpex(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))

  ssopab2i(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  sylibr(wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))
  simpl(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  prss(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  df-xp(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  syl6eqr(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), c3, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  uneq12d(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0)), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, cv(hs1)))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  preq12d(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0)), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, cv(hs1))), cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  opeq2d(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  opeq2d(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, cv(hs1)), cfv(cordt, c3), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  fveq2d(cordt, cv(hs1), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  preq12d(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cv(hs1)), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  opeq2d(cfv(cple, cnx), cv(hs1), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  opeq2d(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cmpt(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))), c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(crab(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)), crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  prex(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))))
  diff.hs1.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs1.c(cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, c3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)

thm ipoval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> }))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(toInc ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 = { < s0, s1 > |({ s0, s1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ s1)}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> })), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> })), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> })), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> })), d(s1, c2))
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 =({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> }), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, ({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> }), (toInc ` c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cipo, ({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> }), [{ < s0, s1 > |({ s0, s1 } ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ s1)} / hs1]({ <(Base ` ndx), hs0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` hs1)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), hs1 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà hs0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> }))
  csbied2(hs1, { < s0, s1 > |({ s0, s1 } ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ s1)}, ({ <(Base ` ndx), hs0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` hs1)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), hs1 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà hs0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà hs0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> }), ({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` c3)> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), c3 >, <(oc ` ndx),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { s1 ‚àà c0 |(s1 ‚ãÇ s0)= ‚àÖ })> }), universe, c3, hs0 = c0)
  a1i(hs0 = c0, { < s0, s1 > |({ s0, s1 } ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ s1)} ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexi({ < s0, s1 > |({ s0, s1 } ‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ s1)}, (hs0 √ó hs0))
  xpex(hs0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)

thm ipobas(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  strfv(c0, c1, cbs, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))), cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat1)))
  ipostr(c0, cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))))
  baseid()
  sstri(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)), cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))
  snsspr1(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  ssun1(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))))))
  fveq2d(cbs, c2, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  ipoval(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))

  ipostr(c0, (ordTop ` { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)}), { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)}, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { hs1 ‚àà c0 |(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)= ‚àÖ }))

  ssun1({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)})> }, { <(le ` ndx), { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)} >, <(oc ` ndx),(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { hs1 ‚àà c0 |(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)= ‚àÖ })> })
  fveq2d(cbs, c2, ({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, <(TopSet ` ndx),(ordTop ` { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)})> } ‚ãÉ { <(le ` ndx), { < hs0, hs1 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ hs1)} >, <(oc ` ndx),(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ { hs1 ‚àà c0 |(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)= ‚àÖ })> }), c0 ‚àà c1)

thm ipolerval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cipo, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtr4d(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cfv(cple, c2), cfv(cple, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls)))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cfv(cple, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))))), wcel(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), universe))

  sseqtr4i(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cxp(c0, c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  ssopab2i(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  sylibr(wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))
  simpl(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  prss(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)

  df-xp(s0, s1, c0, c0)
  sqxpexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cxp(c0, c0), universe)
  strfv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), universe, cple, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(crab(s1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s1), cv(s0)), emptycls))))))), cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat1)))

  ipoval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

thm ipotset(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cordt, c2), cfv(cts, c3), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(cts, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cfv(cts, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))))), wcel(cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), universe))
  fvex(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  strfv(cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), universe, cts, cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))), cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat1)))
  ipostr(c0, cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)))))
  tsetid()
  sstri(csn(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cun(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cple, cnx), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crab(hs1, c0, wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls))))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))
  snsspr2(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cordt, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0))

  fveq2d(cordt, c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, c1))

blocks.name: ipole
blocks.content: Weak order condition of the inclusion poset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ipole(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wb(wbr(c2, c4, c3), wss(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cipo, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c5))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wbr(c2, c4, c3), wss(c2, c3), wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), c3), wa(wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0), wss(c2, c3)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wb(wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), c3), wa(wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0), wss(c2, c3))))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wa(wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0), wss(c2, c3)), wa(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0), wss(c2, c3))

thm isipodrs(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(cfv(cipo, c0), cdrs), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wss(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(cfv(cipo, c0), cdrs), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wss(cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  nsyl2(wcel(cfv(cipo, c0), cdrs), wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cipo, c0)), emptycls))
  neneqd(cfv(cbs, cfv(cipo, c0)), emptycls, wcel(cfv(cipo, c0), cdrs))
  drsbn0(cfv(cipo, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cipo, c0)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cfv(cipo, c0)), emptycls, cfv(cbs, emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(cipo, c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cipo)
  base0()

blocks.name: ipodrsfi

blocks.name: fpwipodrs

blocks.content: An algebraic closure system satisfies ~ isacs3 . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: acsdrsel
blocks.content: An algebraic closure system contains all directed unions of closed sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsdrsel(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(cfv(cipo, c2), cdrs)), wcel(cuni(c2), c0))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(cfv(cipo, c2), cdrs), wcel(cuni(c2), c0))
  rspcdva(hs0, c2, cpw(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wss(c2, c0)), wi(wcel(cfv(cipo, c2), cdrs), wcel(cuni(c2), c0)), wi(wcel(cfv(cipo, cv(hs0)), cdrs), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cfv(cipo, cv(hs0)), cdrs), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(cipo, c2), cdrs), wcel(cuni(c2), c0))
  eleq1d(cfv(cipo, cv(hs0)), cdrs, cfv(cipo, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cipo)
  eleq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0, cuni(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wcel(cfv(cipo, cv(hs0)), cdrs), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  simprd(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wcel(cfv(cipo, cv(hs0)), cdrs), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)))
  isacs3lem(hs0, c0, c1)
  biimpar(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cpw(c0)))
  elpw2g(c0, cfv(cacs, c1), c2)

blocks.name: isacs4lem
blocks.content: In a closure system in which directed unions of closed sets are closed, closure commutes with directed unions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isacs4lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wcel(cfv(cipo, cv(s0)), cdrs), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wral(s1, cpw(cpw(c1)), wi(wcel(cfv(cipo, cv(s1)), cdrs), wceq(cfv(c2, cuni(cv(s1))), cuni(cima(c2, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {

blocks.name: isacs5lem
blocks.content: If closure commutes with directed unions, then the closure of a set is the closure of its finite subsets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Apr-2015.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

blocks.name: isacs3

blocks.name: acsficld
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, the closure of a set is the union of the closures of its finite subsets. Deduction form of ~ acsficl . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: acsficl2d
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, an element is in the closure of a set if and only if it is in the closure of a finite subset. Alternate form of ~ acsficl . Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

  mpbiri(wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c4)), wfun(c1), wfun(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c4), cint(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))

  funeqd(c1, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c4), cint(crab(hs1, c3, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c4)))

blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, a set is independent if and only if all its finite subsets are independent. Part of Proposition 4.1.3 in [FaureFrolicher] p. 83. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

  simplr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  elpwid(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  elin1d(cv(hs0), cpw(c0), cfn, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  ismri2dd(hs1, c0, c1, c4, c2, c3, wa(w0, wss(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), c1)))

blocks.name: acsmapd
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, if ` T ` is contained in the closure of ` S ` , there is a map ` f ` from ` T ` into the set of finite subsets of ` S ` such that the closure of ` U. ran f ` contains ` T ` . This is proven by applying ~ acsficl2d to each element of ` T ` . See Section II.5 in [Cohn] p. 81 to 82. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: acsmap2d
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, if ` S ` and ` T ` have the same closure and ` S ` is independent, then there is a map ` f ` from ` T ` into the set of finite subsets of ` S ` such that ` S ` equals the union of ` ran f ` . This is proven by taking the map ` f ` from ~ acsmapd and observing that, since ` S ` and ` T ` have the same closure, the closure of ` U. ran f ` must contain ` S ` . Since ` S ` is independent, by ~ mrissmrcd , ` U. ran f ` must equal ` S ` . See Section II.5 in [Cohn] p. 81 to 82. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsmap2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wceq(c1, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmri, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wceq(c1, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  acsmapd(s0, c0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)
  mrissd(c1, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  sseqtr4d(c0, cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c0), w0)
  mrcssidd(c0, c4, c2, c3, w0)
  eximdv(s0, w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wceq(c1, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))
  ex(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))), wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wceq(c1, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))), wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wceq(c1, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))
  simprl(w0, wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))
  mrissmrcd(c1, cuni(crn(cv(s0))), c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  sstrd(c1, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))), cfv(c4, c1), wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  mrcssidd(c1, c4, c2, c3, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  eqsstrd(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))), cfv(c4, c0), wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c0)))
  sseqtrd(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))), wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  mrcssd(c4, c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))), c2, c3, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  simprr(w0, wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))
  mrcssvd(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))), c3, c2, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  mrcidmd(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))), c2, c3, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  sstrd(cuni(crn(cv(s0))), c3, c1, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  mrissd(c1, c3, c5, c2, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))), wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)))
  acsmred(c2, c3, w0)
  ad2antrl(w0, wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0))))), wss(cuni(crn(cv(s0))), c1))
  syl6sseq(cuni(crn(cv(s0))), c1, cuni(cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))
  unissd(crn(cv(s0)), cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))
  frn(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn))
  unifpw(c1)
  adantr(w0, wa(wf(cv(s0), c0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wss(c0, cfv(c4, cuni(crn(cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, c5))
}

thm acsmap2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ ran(s0))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(ACS ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(mrCls ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(mrInd ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c4 ` c1)=(c4 ` c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ ran(s0))), ‚àÉ(s0,((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))))
  acsmapd(s0, c0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)
  mrissd(c1, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  sseqtr4d(c0, (c4 ` c1), (c4 ` c0), w0)
  mrcssidd(c0, c4, c2, c3, w0)
  eximdv(s0, w0, ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0))), ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))
  ex(w0, ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0))), ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))
  jca((w0 ‚àß((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))), (s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin)), c1 = ‚ãÉ ran(s0))
  simprl(w0, (s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin)), c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))
  mrissmrcd(c1, ‚ãÉ ran(s0), c2, c3, c4, c5, (w0 ‚àß((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))))
  sstrd(c1, (c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)), (c4 ` c1), (w0 ‚àß((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))))
  mrcssidd(c1, c4, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))))
  eqsstrd((c4 ` c1), (c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)), (c4 ` c0), (w0 ‚àß((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))))
  adantr(w0, ((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0))), (c4 ` c1)=(c4 ` c0))
  sseqtrd((c4 ` c0), (c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)), (c4 `(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0))), (w0 ‚àß((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))))
  mrcssd(c4, c0, (c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)), c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß((s0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(c4 ` ‚ãÉ ran(s0)))))

blocks.name: acsinfd
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, if ` S ` and ` T ` have the same closure and ` S ` is infinite independent, then ` T ` is infinite. This follows from applying ~ unirnffid to the map given in ~ acsmap2d . See Section II.5 in [Cohn] p. 81 to 82. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsinfd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cacs, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmrc, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmri, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c3, c5), cfv(c3, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c5, cfn)))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wa(wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))))
  acsmap2d(hs0, c0, c5, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  pm2.65da(wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c5, cfn))
  eqeltrd(c5, cfn, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), wa(wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, cfn)))
  simplrr(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  unirnffid(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, cfn)))
  sylancl(wa(wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, cfn)), wf(cv(hs0), c0, cfn), wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wss(cin(cpw(c5), cfn), cfn))
  simplrl(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  inss2(cpw(c5), cfn)
  fss(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn), cfn)
  simpr(wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c0, cin(cpw(c5), cfn)), wceq(c5, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cfn), wn(wcel(c5, cfn)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(c0, cfn)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm acsinfd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(ACS ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(mrCls ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(mrInd ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3 ` c5)=(c3 ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c5 ‚àà Fin)
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin, ((hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)))
  acsmap2d(hs0, c0, c5, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  pm2.65da((w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))), c0 ‚àà Fin, c5 ‚àà Fin)
  eqeltrd(c5, cfn, ‚ãÉ ran(hs0), ((w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà Fin))
  simplrr(w0, (hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin)), c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0), c0 ‚àà Fin)
  unirnffid(hs0, c0, ((w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà Fin))
  sylancl(((w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)))‚àß c0 ‚àà Fin), (hs0 : c0 ‚Üí Fin), (hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin)), (P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin)‚äÜ Fin)
  simplrl(w0, (hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin)), c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0), c0 ‚àà Fin)
  inss2(P(c5), cfn)
  fss(hs0, c0, (P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin), cfn)
  simpr((w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))), c0 ‚àà Fin)
  ad2antrr(w0, ((hs0 : c0 ‚Üí(P(c5)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c5 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)), c0 ‚àà Fin, ¬¨ c5 ‚àà Fin)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: acsdomd
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, if ` S ` and ` T ` have the same closure and ` S ` is infinite independent, then ` T ` dominates ` S ` . This follows from applying ~ acsinfd and then applying ~ unirnfdomd to the map given in ~ acsmap2d . See Section II.5 in [Cohn] p. 81 to 82. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsdomd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmri, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))))
  acsmap2d(hs0, c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqbrtrd(c0, cdom, c1, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))))
  simprr(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))
  unirnfdomd(cv(hs0), c1, universe, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cfn), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wss(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), cfn))
  simprl(w0, wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))
  inss2(cpw(c0), cfn)
  fss(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), cfn)
  adantr(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))), wn(wcel(c1, cfn)))
  acsinfd(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0, w0)
  ssexd(c1, c3, universe, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))))
  elfvexd(c3, c2, cacs, wa(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0)))))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))), wss(c1, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cdom, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm acsdomd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[‚âº]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(ACS ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(mrCls ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(mrInd ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c4 ` c0)=(c4 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin)
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, c0[‚âº]c1, ((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)))
  acsmap2d(hs0, c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eqbrtrd(c0, cdom, c1, ‚ãÉ ran(hs0), (w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))
  simprr(w0, (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)), c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))
  unirnfdomd(hs0, c1, universe, (w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí Fin), (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)), (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚äÜ Fin)
  simprl(w0, (hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)), c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))
  inss2(P(c0), cfn)
  fss(hs0, c1, (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), cfn)
  adantr(w0, ((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)), ¬¨ c1 ‚àà Fin)
  acsinfd(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0, w0)
  ssexd(c1, c3, universe, (w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))
  elfvexd(c3, c2, cacs, (w0 ‚àß((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0))))
  adantr(w0, ((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)), c2 ‚àà(ACS ` c3))
  adantr(w0, ((hs0 : c1 ‚Üí(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))‚àß c0 = ‚ãÉ ran(hs0)), c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[‚âº]c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: acsinfdimd
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system, if two independent sets have equal closure and one is infinite, then they are equinumerous. This is proven by using ~ acsdomd twice with ~ acsinfd . See Section II.5 in [Cohn] p. 81 to 82. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsinfdimd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmri, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)))
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(c1, cdom, c0))
  acsdomd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  acsdomd(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mrissd(c0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c0), w0)
  acsinfd(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0, w0)
  mrissd(c1, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  acsmred(c2, c3, w0)
  sbth(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm acsinfdimd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[‚âÖ]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(ACS ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(mrCls ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(mrInd ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c4 ` c0)=(c4 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, c0[‚âÖ]c1, c0[‚âº]c1, c1[‚âº]c0)
  acsdomd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  acsdomd(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mrissd(c0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  eqcomd((c4 ` c1), (c4 ` c0), w0)
  acsinfd(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0, w0)
  mrissd(c1, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  acsmred(c2, c3, w0)
  sbth(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: acsexdimd
blocks.content: In an algebraic closure system whose closure operator has the exchange property, if two independent sets have equal closure, they are equinumerous. See ~ mreexfidimd for the finite case and ~ acsinfdimd for the infinite case. This is a special case of Theorem 4.2.2 in [FaureFrolicher] p. 87. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm acsexdimd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmri, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cpw(c3), wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, cdif(cfv(c4, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(c4, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, cfn))
  mreexfidimd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)))
  acsmred(c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cpw(c3), wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, cdif(cfv(c4, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(c4, cun(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))))))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c5))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))
  acsinfdimd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(c2, cfv(cacs, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(c0, c5))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(c1, c5))
  adantr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wn(wcel(c0, cfn)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm acsexdimd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[‚âÖ]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(ACS ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(mrCls ` c2)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c3), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà((c4 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))\(c4 ` s0)), s1 ‚àà(c4 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s2 }))))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c5)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, c0[‚âÖ]c1, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  mreexfidimd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà Fin))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà(Moore ` c3))
  acsmred(c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà Fin, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c3), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà((c4 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s1 }))\(c4 ` s0)), s1 ‚àà(c4 `(s0 ‚ãÉ { s2 }))))))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà Fin, c0 ‚àà c5)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà c5)
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà Fin, (c4 ` c0)=(c4 ` c1))
  acsinfdimd(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (w0 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà(ACS ` c3))
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin, c0 ‚àà c5)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin, c1 ‚àà c5)
  adantr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin, (c4 ` c0)=(c4 ` c1))
  simpr(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà Fin)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: mrelatglb
blocks.content: Greatest lower bounds in a Moore space are realized by intersections. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mrelatglb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls)), wceq(cfv(c3, c2), cint(c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cipo, c0))

blocks.name: mreclatBAD
blocks.content: A Moore space is a complete lattice under inclusion. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.) TODO ( ~ df-riota update): Reprove using ~ isclat instead of the isclatBAD. hypothesis. See commented-out mreclat above.
